text: Kru Gotɨndu kuyu mɨŋata ambavaravara hama ambami, Ŋgamara, navundi muŋambɨ kru naŋga kɨhɨrɨ upɨ maŋgarɨhatara kɨpɨ naŋgandɨta, kru ñɨŋi kavɨrɨmandɨ. Kamati nuŋandɨ ñɨmbi Emanuel vɨrɨmandɨyu, vami. Kanɨmavami kuyu nɨŋandɨhin kandɨsɨkwɨsɨkwɨ yɨvurahi. Emanuel ñɨmbi kanɨŋandɨhindu kuyu sapa ha nɨmata, Got ara naŋga kɨyɨ.
